children.name: Rails
unlocks: Lets colonists use rails to get around. You don't need to provide them with minecarts, as they automagically create their own for each trip

unlocks.template: {0} can use Totems of Undying to increase chance of resurrection
{0} run toward graves instead of walking

chains.name: Accuracy
unlocks: Reduces the time Guards sleep by 50%

chains.name: Taunt
unlocks: After a Guard attacks a mob, the mob targets the Guard instead of citizens or the player
